0110101001000101 0111111000110010 0 -> sum: 1110100001110111, cout: 0
1101101011011110 0101011111010001 0 -> sum: 0011001010101111, cout: 1

1011001001010101 0100101100000000 1 -> sum: 1111110101010110, cout: 0
0100110001011100 1101011011110000 0 -> sum: 0010001101001100, cout: 1
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
